name: Work To Due
description: ‘Work to Due’ is a choose your own adventure, point and click, 2D game. Made with pixel art in Photoshop, and combined with animation and programming in Microsoft Powerpoint, ‘Work to Due’ simulates the player becoming a student and choosing whether to do school work, or ignore their responsibilities. The game has 4 paths that can be chosen, encouraging the student to retry if choosing the more work-neglected paths.
